    • Constructor Detail

      • TGAImage

        public TGAImage​(short xOrigin,
                short yOrigin,
                short imgWidth,
                short imgHeight,
                byte pixelDepth,
                byte imgDescriptor,
                byte[][][] imgData)
        Constructs a TGA image with xOrigin, yOrigin, width, height, pixelDepth, image descriptor and pixel data of image.
        Parameters:
        xOrigin - X Origin field from image file header.
        yOrigin - Y Origin field from image file header.
        imgWidth - width of image.
        imgHeight - height of image.
        pixelDepth - pixel Depth of image.
        imgDescriptor - image descriptor from image file header.
        imgData - pixel data of image.

      • TGAImage

        public TGAImage​(java.lang.String filePath)
         throws InvalidImageException
        Constructs a TGA image, that is loaded from a file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - path of image file to be loaded.
        Throws:
        InvalidImageException - if loaded image is invalid.
